text: Content Staging seems off to me. Anyone else having this problem? A page, even though it is staged, show up both in staged proof and unmodified. No URL conflict is reported but there should be one, because it is our homepage, it is live at both <http://domain.nl/|domain.nl/> and <http://www-domain-nl.sandbox.hs-sites.com|www-domain-nl.sandbox.hs-sites.com>
I meant domain as an example. In fact, our domain is <http://mprise.nl|mprise.nl>
Hi! I would like to import contact data using an API endpoint into my HubSpot portal. I'd appreciate if someone can point me in the right direction

Hi all

We just added our first React App to HubSpot since local dev got available
But the state doesn't seem to update.
When we log the state it shows up in the console, but the app itself isn't showing the updated state. This problem occurs only when the internet connection is a bit slow. Could HubSpot cache be messing with the state and now showing the updated version?
It is a small React app on a HubSpot page showing some posts with a filter.
I think this is what you are looking for: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/batch_create_or_update>
let me know if you have any questions on that
No, React state is local to the client.
Thanks for the response. I'll give it a go
I figured it out! It's `_hsq.push(['trackEvent', { ... }])`, not `_hsq.push(['trackEvent'], { ... })`
ah, sorry I didnâ€™t catch that.  Thanks for following up!
Anyone else ever have an issue with a bootstrap 4 nav bar in mobile collapsing correctly on one page and not collapsing on another?
Heya <@UHC710Q1E>, I'm only see that page in Staged proof, but not in unmodified. Wanna DM me some more details?
